title: IDraftFeatureData2.IGetDraftedEntities
description: Gets the drafted entities (faces or edges) for this draft feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of entities of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IDraftFeatureData2::GetDraftedEntityCount
to determine the size of the array.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
